name: YouVersionBible
0:
”Alexa, ask YouVersion Bible to read John”
”Alexa, ask YouVersion Bible to read my plan”
”Alexa, ask YouVersion Bible for the verse of the day”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the bible app
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to the Bible, a daily devotional, Reading Plans, the Verse of the Day and your prayer list. YouVersion Bible is completely free and lets you listen to books, chapters and verses of the Bible. You can listen to daily Reading Plans that you subscribe to in the Bible App and even pray over your prayer list. 

YouVersion Bible includes 5 professionally narrated Bible versions (ESV, NLT, NIV, KJV, MSG).

To use, simply say one of the following:
 ● "Alexa, open YouVersion Bible"
 ● "Alexa, ask YouVersion Bible to read Psalms"
 ● "Alexa, ask YouVersion Bible to read the daily devotional"
 ● "Alexa, tell YouVersion Bible to read my plan"
 ● "Alexa, tell YouVersion Bible to read the verse of the day"
 ● "Alexa, ask YouVersion Bible for my prayer list"

Download the free Bible App for iPhone/iPad, Android devices and Amazon tablets at bible.com/app.

Send us an email with your suggestions at help@youversion.com.
